item.title: Podman
item.description: I don’t have enough interest nor expertise in containers to add much to the Podman vs. Docker debate. I chose Podman for two reasons: Podman is configurable with Nix-Darwin. Podman’s daemonless architecture is one less running root. NixOS # Enabling Podman on NixOS can be reduced to a one-liner. The default storage is overlay. CC-BY-SA-4.0 { flake.nixosModules.podman = { virtualisation.podman.enable = true; }; } Nix-Darwin # There’s no Docker virtualization in Nix-DarwinÂ 1, nor is there any virtualisation config at all.
